title: Get Graph Statistics
description: Retrieve overall statistics about the knowledge graph including node counts and edge counts
query: MATCH (n) RETURN labels(n) as type, count(n) as count ORDER BY count DESC

title: Find All Claims About HIV
description: Search for all claims that mention HIV in their text
query: MATCH (c:Claim) WHERE c.text =~ '.*[Hh][Ii][Vv].*' RETURN c.predicate, c.confidence, c.text, c.evidence_type ORDER BY c.confidence DESC LIMIT 10

title: Find High-Confidence Causal Claims
description: Find claims with high confidence scores that describe causal relationships
query: MATCH (c:Claim) WHERE c.predicate IN ['CAUSES', 'PREVENTS', 'INHIBITS'] AND c.confidence >= 0.7 RETURN c.predicate, c.confidence, c.text ORDER BY c.confidence DESC LIMIT 10

title: Papers and Their Claims
description: List papers along with the number and types of claims they make
query: MATCH (p:Paper)-[:MAKES_CLAIM]->(c:Claim) RETURN [p.paper_id, p.title, count(c), collect(DISTINCT c.predicate)] ORDER BY count(c) DESC LIMIT 10

title: Claims with Supporting Evidence
description: Find claims that have evidence supporting them, showing evidence type and strength
query: MATCH (e:Evidence)-[:SUPPORTS]->(c:Claim) RETURN c.predicate, c.text, e.type, e.strength, e.supports ORDER BY CASE e.strength WHEN 'high' THEN 3 WHEN 'medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END DESC LIMIT 10

title: Entity Mentions
description: List all entities in the graph with their types
query: MATCH (e:Entity) RETURN e.entity_id, e.name, e.type ORDER BY e.name LIMIT 20

title: Claims by Predicate Type
description: Count how many claims exist for each predicate type
query: MATCH (c:Claim) RETURN c.predicate, count(*) as count, avg(c.confidence) as avg_confidence ORDER BY count DESC

title: Papers with Most Claims
description: Find which papers make the most claims in the dataset
query: MATCH (p:Paper)-[:MAKES_CLAIM]->(c:Claim) RETURN p.paper_id, p.title, count(c) as num_claims ORDER BY num_claims DESC LIMIT 10

title: Claims About AIDS
description: Find all claims that mention AIDS in their text
query: MATCH (c:Claim) WHERE c.text =~ '.*[Aa][Ii][Dd][Ss].*' RETURN c.predicate, c.confidence, c.text ORDER BY c.confidence DESC LIMIT 10

title: Evidence by Type
description: Count evidence items by their type (cohort_study, ELISA, etc.)
query: MATCH (e:Evidence) RETURN e.type, count(*) as count, collect(DISTINCT CASE e.strength WHEN 'high' THEN 'high' WHEN 'medium' THEN 'medium' ELSE 'low' END) as strengths ORDER BY count DESC

title: Paper Network - Shared Claims
description: Find papers that make similar types of claims
query: MATCH (p1:Paper)-[:MAKES_CLAIM]->(c1:Claim), (p2:Paper)-[:MAKES_CLAIM]->(c2:Claim) WHERE p1.paper_id < p2.paper_id AND c1.predicate = c2.predicate RETURN p1.paper_id, p2.paper_id, c1.predicate, count(*) as shared_predicate_count ORDER BY shared_predicate_count DESC LIMIT 10

title: Claims with Entities
description: Find claims that are linked to specific entities (subject or object)
query: MATCH (c:Claim)-[r:HAS_SUBJECT|HAS_OBJECT]->(e:Entity) RETURN c.predicate, c.text, type(r) as relationship, e.name, e.type LIMIT 10

title: Infection-Related Claims
description: Find all claims about infection with their confidence scores
query: MATCH (c:Claim) WHERE c.predicate IN ['INFECTS', 'INFECTED_BY', 'DETECTED_IN'] RETURN c.predicate, c.confidence, c.text, c.evidence_type ORDER BY c.confidence DESC LIMIT 10

title: Treatment and Prevention Claims
description: Find claims about treatments and prevention strategies
query: MATCH (c:Claim) WHERE c.predicate IN ['TREATS', 'PREVENTS'] RETURN c.predicate, c.confidence, c.text ORDER BY c.confidence DESC LIMIT 10

title: Paragraphs by Section Type
description: Count paragraphs by their section type (abstract, results, methods, etc.)
query: MATCH (p:Paragraph) RETURN p.section_type, count(*) as count ORDER BY count DESC
